text: Isaías "Iyo" S. Pimentel (16 February 1933 — 26 June 2017) was a Venezuelan international tennis player. He was born on the Dutch island of Curaçao. Pimentel was three times Curaçaoan champion.Tennisheld Pimentel overleden - Antilliaans Dagblad He competed in the Davis Cup, representing Venezuela, a number of times, from 1957 to 1966.Isaias Pimentel at daviscup.comMemoria de los Séptimos Juegos Deportivos Centroamericanos Antonio Isse Núñez, Comité Organizador de los Séptimos Juegos Deportivos Centroamericanos y del Caribe - 1954 Page 106 "Isaías Pimentel y Hugo Gerharts" Pimentel died on 26 June 2017 in Willemstad, Curaçao at the age of 84.Tennisheld Pimentel overleden ==References== ==Other websites== * * *Tennis Archives Category:1933 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Curaçao sportspeople Category:Male tennis players Category:Venezuelan sportspeople
title: Isaías Pimentel
